api_list.name: Get all available face parts
api_list.description: Get IDs of parts currently applied to the face and available options. Parts may vary from face to face based on recognised attributes.

required_parameters.name: face_id
required_parameters.description: Face ID you got from /generate endpoint

api_list.name: Get face attributes
api_list.description: Get estimated face attributes such as age and gender.

required_parameters.name: face_id
required_parameters.description: Face ID obtained from Generate endpoint

api_list.name: Get sticker
api_list.description:
Get URL for a sticker for given face. Supported stickers can be explored at https://mirrorai.github.io

Note that sticker style must match face style used while generating the face.

Currently there are two styles availible:
* kenga (aka "line" in MirrorAI app)
* anime

api_list.name: Get token
api_list.description: Get a token for making further requests. Faces can be managed only with tokens they were generated with.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mirror-ai.p.rapidapi.com/token"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mirror-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mirror-ai.p.rapidapi.com/token"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mirror-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
